title: Okta Help
content: .) Frequently Asked Questions What should I do if I forget my password? Click Forgot Password on your organization's sign-in page. Choose an option to reset. If you have a working MFA on your phone, you should be able to reset with that or you can send email. This usually sends an email to your personal and work emails. I have a new device. How do I reset my MFA? See the documentation provided here: . How do I sign into Okta? Open a web browser and enter http:// simpli .okta.com. Then, enter your username (company email) and password and select Sign-in . Proceed with your authenticator of choice. How I report a security issue related to Okta? Send an email to digitalworkplace@simpli.fi & security@simpli.fi documenting what happened. Attach any notable screenshots that could be useful.
